body.p: You can automatically load the last project you worked on every time you start wxUiEditor. To enable this feature, got to the File menu, choose Preferences and check "Always load last project".
You can easily create a tool in a toolbar with the same ID and event handler as a menu item. Simply select the menu item and press Ctrl+C, then select the toolbar and press Ctrl+V.
Ctrl+D will display a list of your recent projects, allowing you to quickly switch between them without needing to go to the File menu.
